name: puzzledatprinceton
title: Puzzled at Princeton
description: Eisgruber has locked you under Nassau Hall in citation of academic mediocrity. To test whether you are still smart enough to stay at Princeton, Eisgruber has built yet another high aspirational environment where you must finish all the puzzles laid out before you can escape back into the orange bubble.
keywords: this last entry CANNOT have a comma after it ->

scripts.deploy: npm run prebuild && webpack --mode production --progress && gh-pages -d build
